section.name: Support
section.p: Below is a list of companies and consultants who provide commercial support, in one form or another, for Tapestry. Being mentioned here is not an indication of official "endorsement" by the Apache Software Foundation, but is instead provided as a public service. This list is in no way a complete listing of the many organizations providing either free or for cost support for ASF projects. If you would like to be added to this list, or removed, please send a message to the dev mailing list.

section.name: Tapestry Support Network
section.p: Operated by Howard Lewis Ship, the creator of Tapestry.
